baseRule.text: 若復苾芻尼以水灑上眾者。波逸底迦。
baseRule.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 78

fullParallels.text: Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhussa bhuñjantassa pānīyena vā vidhūpanena vā upatiṭṭheyya, pācittiyaṁ.
fullParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 6

translations.text: Welche Nonne aber mit einem Getränk oder mit einem Fächer einem essenden Mönch aufwartet, muß dafür sühnen.
Should any bhikkhuni, when a bhikkhu is eating, attend on him with water or a fan, it is to be confessed.
Jika ada Bhikkhuni yang, ketika seorang Bhikkhu sedang makan, menghampiri dia dengan air atau kipas, itu harus di akui.

fullParallels.text: 「若比丘尼，比丘無病時，供給水，以扇扇者，波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 75

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼。捉水瓶及扇立比丘前。若給水若扇。波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 143

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼。比丘食時在前立待。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 77

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼。比丘食以水扇供給波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahāsaṅghika Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 79
